title: Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales

headings.text: How to Play Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales
Who Created Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales?

controls: Use the arrow keys to control Fireboy.Use the W, A, S, D keys to control Watergirl.Click and drag to direct fairies when needed.
Use the on-screen buttons to control Fireboy and Watergirl.Tap and drag to move the fairies.
content.howToPlay:
In Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales, co-operative playing is essential. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you get started:

Fireboy is immune to fire and lava, while Watergirl can handle water puddles with ease. However, neither can step on green goo, so plan your movements carefully.The magical fairies can move platforms, push buttons, or activate mechanisms. Drag them to the required spots to aid Fireboy and Watergirl. However, in some cases, you need to find the fairy with the correct color to activate mechanisms.Your aim is to collect all the red and blue gems and reach the exit gates. Blue (Watergirl's) and red (Fireboy's) gems are not only fun to grab but are also key to completing the levels with full success. Meanwhile, if you'd like to play casual and not interested in full success, you can collect only the white gems that are necessary to unlock new levels.So, go on and solve puzzles and unlock doors to lead the characters to their respective exits. Timing and coordination are crucial for success.

fullContent: Home› Co-OpFireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy TalesBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenFireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales takes you on another co-op adventure with the cute elemental duo, Fireboy and Watergirl. In this puzzle-platformer game, you’ll guide two characters through mysterious temples filled with tricky puzzles and obstacles. Plot twist: magical fairies join the quest to assist the duo in navigating through increasingly complex challenges. Drag sparkling fairies to push buttons use levers and more.Fireboy and Watergirl 6 is packed with teamwork-based gameplay, where two charachters unique abilities are key to solving each level. Play solo or grab a friend to enjoy this classic game right here on OnlineGames.io. Remember, teamwork makes the dream work!ControlsComputer:Use the arrow keys to control Fireboy.Use the W, A, S, D keys to control Watergirl.Click and drag to direct fairies when needed.Smartphone:Use the on-screen buttons to control Fireboy and Watergirl.Tap and drag to move the fairies.How to Play Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy TalesIn Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales, co-operative playing is essential. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you get started:Fireboy is immune to fire and lava, while Watergirl can handle water puddles with ease. However, neither can step on green goo, so plan your movements carefully.The magical fairies can move platforms, push buttons, or activate mechanisms. Drag them to the required spots to aid Fireboy and Watergirl. However, in some cases, you need to find the fairy with the correct color to activate mechanisms.Your aim is to collect all the red and blue gems and reach the exit gates. Blue (Watergirl's) and red (Fireboy's) gems are not only fun to grab but are also key to completing the levels with full success. Meanwhile, if you'd like to play casual and not interested in full success, you can collect only the white gems that are necessary to unlock new levels.So, go on and solve puzzles and unlock doors to lead the characters to their respective exits. Timing and coordination are crucial for success.The Magic of the FairiesA new twist in this sixth and last installment is the introduction of fairies. These glowing companions are more than just decorative—they’re your problem solvers. Fairies can:Move Platforms: Drag them to lift or lower platforms for better access.Push Buttons: Assign a fairy to hold down a button while you move your characters to new areas.Unlock New Paths: Direct them by dragging to activate levers or switches to create pathways.These fairies make gameplay more fun making the duo's adventures are like real Fairy Tales. Just when they don't think it's impossible for them to reach the exit gates, a fairy touch resolves their problem. How magical is that?Who Created Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales?This installment of the beloved Fireboy and Watergirl series was developed by Oslo Albet, a name well-known for crafting engaging co-op puzzle games. If you’re a fan of this series, you can explore all the previous titles for free on OnlineGames.io. Simply visit the Co-op Games Online page or type "Fireboy" in the search bar to access the entire collection.Looking for a recommendation? Play Fireboy and Watergirl 5: Elements—a thrilling game that combines the best features of the first four installments, offering a well-rounded mix of puzzles, challenges, and environments. It's the perfect warm-up before diving into Fairy Tales!CompatibilityYou can play Fireboy and Watergirl 6: Fairy Tales on:DesktopsLaptopsChromebooksAndroidiOSThis article was updated on December 9, 20242 Player2DArcadeBrainCo-OpCuteEscapeFreeHTML5KidsLogicMobilePuzzleWater
